resources.string: You just took your first step to protect mother Earth from the demonically hazardous E-WASTE!
If your product can be reused after being repaired, then press
If its no longer usable but can be recycled, then to have it recycled and get the remanent scrap disposed properly after treatment press
Ans:-To strengthen the implementation of EPR at consumer level by making the collection of E-Waste from the end users easy and fast
Ans:-Because certains items which can not be recycle in anyway has to get disposed after proper treatment to maintain ecological stability and reduces landfills
Q4:How will the price by paid?
Ans:-The collection representative will pay at the time of collecting E-Waste
This application has been a consequence of the research conducted by a team of 5 CSE undergraduate under the enriching guidance of Mrs.Ipshita Saha.The members include:-
